media_buy_id.description: Publisher's unique identifier for the media buy

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for this media buy

promoted_offering.description: Description of advertiser and what is being promoted

packages.description: Array of packages within this media buy

creative_deadline.description: ISO 8601 timestamp for creative upload deadline

ext.description: Extension object for implementation-specific data. Implementers SHOULD namespace custom fields to avoid collisions (e.g., 'buyer_campaign_id', 'attribution_*', 'tracking_*'). See https://docs.adcontextprotocol.org/reference/extensions for conventions and examples.
